features: Made with plant-based cleansers and moisturizers, Pure Fresh 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioner for men is designed to give you strong, healthy-looking hair
This sulfate-free men’s shampoo and conditioner is formulated with vitamin C and mineral complex to cleanse, moisturize and strengthen hair
Jump-start your day by energizing your senses with the refreshing, earthy scent of Orange & Sage Pure Fresh 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioner
Formulated with 92% naturally derived ingredients, natural essential oils and plant-based cleansers and moisturizers
Dove does not test on animals and is PETA/vegan approved
How to use: Directions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse. For best results, use regularly
body.description: Start your day with Dove! Dove Men+Care Pure Fresh 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner with nourishing, plant-based cleansers and moisturizers is the obvious answer when you want clean ingredients without sacrificing performance. This sulfate-free men’s shampoo with vitamin C and mineral complex cleans and nourishes hair follicles, leaving you with healthier-looking hair. Reinvigorate your scalp and uplift your mood with the irresistible, zesty scent of Orange & Sage 2-in-1 shampoo + conditioner. Our carefully crafted formula is 92% naturally derived, has effective plant-based cleansers, and is vegan & cruelty free. Made in a 100% recycled & recyclable plastic bottle. This naturally derived 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner for men goes well with the Dove styling line: Dove Men + Care Molding Paste for relaxed & flexible hair with a natural look, Polishing Pomade for soft & smooth hair with a sleek and polished finish, Taming Gel for all-day hold and shine for well-defined hair, or Shaping Putty for thick & full hair with a conditioned look. Use it with the entire line of Dove Men + Care natural products for the perfect grooming routine, such as Dove Men Lime + Cedarwood Body & Face Wash and Dove Men Lime + Cedarwood Dry Spray Antiperspirant.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: New Dove Men+Care 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioners with 92% naturally derived ingredients. This sulfate and paraben-free range is infused with a vitamin C + mineral complex.

NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS Made with stimulating plant-based cleansers and moisturizers. VITAMIN C & MINERAL COMPLEX Cleans and hydrates for strong, healthy-looking hair. PARABEN & SULFATE FREE Fresh, healthy hair free of harmful chemicals. CRUELTY FREE Dove does not test on animals and is PETA approved.

Dove Men+Care Pure Fresh 2-in-1 Shampoo & Conditioner - Orange+Sage Dove Men+Care Eucalyptus & Cedar Oil Soap Bar, 5 oz Dove Men+Care Soothing Sandalwood + Orange Dry Spray Antiperspirant, 3.8 oz Main Benefit Invigorate your scalp and moisturize hair with 92% naturally derived ingredients, infused with Vitamin C and mineral complex for strong, healthy-looking hair. Give your skin superior moisture with our relaxing, eucalyptus and cedar oil-scented cleansing bar. Cold-pressed and plant-powered, this bar is perfect for hair, body, face and shaving. This plant-based antiperspirant dry spray gives you 72H protection against sweat and Odor so that you can feel ready for whatever the day throws at you..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great men's 2 in 1
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Smells good and makes your hair soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mens Hair Care with a nice scent.
reviews.reviewText: I generally go with a shampoo without scent, but I have used Dove Mens Care products in the past and thought I'd try this. This shampoo maintains the excellent Dove Mens Care quality that you've come to know, but how was the scent. It provides a light orange scent with a stronger focus on the sage. It's actually a manly scent. I will admit, I was original concerned it might not be a masculine scent, but I'm more than happy to use it on a daily basis.This shampoo lathers up very well and washes out clean. My wife likes the scent and so I'm glad I picked this up.I have chosen to rate this product 5 stars. Overall, I expected this to be just as nice as other Dove Mens Care products I have used in the past and it didn't fail me. This one has a nice scent to go along with the quality wash. If you like sage and orange, I'd recommend this product for you.Criteria for Stars:1 - Total rip off, doesn't perform basic advertised functions or not product advertised. I would likely RETURN and would NEVER recommend.2 - Not worth the money. Performs some of the basic advertised functions, but likely not all, and ultimately was deemed as not providing enough value for the money spent. I would not buy again, and would likely not recommend unless the buyer had a very specific use case.3 - It performs the basic functions as advertised, and has some usefulness at the price point, but doesn't work for all of the reasons I purchased. I would likely not buy again, and would only recommend if buyer understood usefulness limitations.4 - It performs most all of the features I purchased it for, but has limitations. I would likely buy again and would recommend.5 - Completely as advertised and likely exceeded expectations. Is if high quality and well shipped. I would totally buy again and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smell is not overpowering. I love it when my man uses it. It smells good and he says it feels good too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not overpowering great scent.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what this combo would smell like in my hair when I got it and I have to say the scent is amazing. While it is not overpowering it is a great orange smell that would work for both men and women in my opinion. I love how the combo shampoo and conditioner really works and leaves my hair feeling soft and smooth as it lathers up really well! I think the pump does a great job of dispensing the perfect amount so that you do not waste too much as a little goes a long way for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent and consistency
reviews.reviewText: The consistency of this shampoo is good, not too thin or thick. A little goes a long way. It is nice to have a pump which is easier to use and can help to avoid wasting product. The scent is very pleasant and doesn't interfere with colognes etc.. Although it states "men" I think it would appear to everyone of all ages. It leaves the hair soft and clean. Anything that saves me time makes me happy. Having a shampoo and conditioner in one (that works-it does) makes it happen. I like that it is said to be paraben and sulfate free which may interfere with other chemical services or damage the hair. Also the ingredients are contained that may be kinder on the hair. I like Dove products and this is another winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This 2-in-1 shampoo worked great for my fine hair. It cleaned it well and left it feeling soft and smooth. I find the orange scent really refreshing. I wasn't an orange scent like goo gone or that hand cleaner, it was different and better. Overall it's a good product I will continue to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo + conditioner lathers and cleans very well. It leaves my hair and beard nice and soft. I am not sure I can say it smells great. It has a nice orange-ish smell from the bottle, but then it feels chemical, but maybe it’s just me (something is off with my sense of smell after COVID). It is a big bottle and a little goes a long way. Given that, the price is good. It works well enough that I am willing to ignore the smell thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and Clean
reviews.reviewText: I like Dove products and was excited to try their Men+Care 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioner Pure Fresh Orange & Sage. I appreciate that it is made with 92% naturally derived ingredients. I appreciate that it is paraben and sulfate free, but also lathers well. It does what it's supposed to do - cleans well and leaves my hair feeling fresh. The scent is nice, not too strong, but refreshing. It's a good choice if you're looking for a simple and effective shampoo and conditioner combo. I'm satisfied with it and plan to continue using it regularly.
